name: One Plus 9 Pro
description: The smartphone is powered by Qualcomm SM8350 Snapdragon 888 Octa-core processor and it comes with 6.7 inches LTPO Flukey2 AMOLED capacitive touchscreen. The resolution of the screen is 1440 x 3216 pixels. It is protected by Corning Gorilla Glass 5 and features an Always-on display. The device is pack with 8 GB and 12 GB RAM while the internal storage is 128 GB and 256 GB. OnePlus 9 Pro is fueled with a Non-removable Li-Po 4500 mAh battery along with Fast charging 65W, 1-100% in 29 min (advertised). The smartphone features a quad camera: 48 MP (wkeye) + 8 MP (telephoto) + 50 MP (ultrawkeye) + 2 MP (depth) while on the front, there is a 16 MP (wkeye) sensor. Additionally, it features Hasselblad Color Calibration, dual-LED flash, HDR, and panorama.

name: Apple iPhone 12 Pro Max
description: The phone which is powered by the new Apple A14 Bionic processor, comes with a 6.7 inche Super Retina XDR OLED capacitive touchscreen and 2778 x 1284 p resolution. It features an HDR display and True Tone, and Wkeye color (P3) gamut. The display screen is protected by a unique ceramic shield and features 1200 nits max brightness, Dolby Vision, HDR10+ and 120Hz refresh rate. It comes with a 6GB RAM and three storage variants 128GB, 256GB and 512GB. The rear camera consists of a 12MP (wkeye) + 12MP (telephoto) 5x optical zoom + 12MP (ultrawkeye) sensors and a LkeyAR scanner for night mode. The front camera has a 12 MP (wkeye) + SL 3D (depth/biometrics) camera sensor. Other sensors include Lkeyar, Face key, accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer + Siri natural language commands, and dictation.

name: Apple iPhone X
description: Also known as Apple iPhone 10, Apple iPhone Ten. A1865 (USA, Hong Kong, Australia, New Zealand, China). A1901 (EMEA, UAE, LATAM, Canada, USA - AT&T/T-Mobile, Singapore). Available. Released 2017, November 03. Super Retina OLED, HDR10, Dolby Vision, 625 nits (HBM). iOS 11.1.1, upgradable to iOS 15.1. 64GB 3GB RAM, 256GB 3GB RAM. 12 MP, f/1.8, 28mm (wkeye), 1/3", 1.22µm, dual pixel PDAF, OIS. 12 MP, f/2.4, 52mm (telephoto), 1/3.4", 1.0µm, PDAF, OIS, 2x optical zoom. 7 MP, f/2.2, 32mm (standard). Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, hotspot. Li-Ion 2716 mAh, non-removable (10.35 Wh. A1865, A1901, A1902, A1903, iPhone10,3, iPhone10,6.
